```{r}
NAm2 = read.table("NAm2.txt", header = TRUE)
#NAm2

cont <- function(x)
{ if (x %in% c("Canada"))
  cont <-"NorthAmerica"
  else if (x %in% c("Guatemala","Mexico","Panama","CostaRica"))
  cont <-"CentralAmerica"
  else
  cont<-"SouthAmerica"
  return (factor(cont))
}
contID <- data.frame(sapply(as.character(NAm2[,4]),FUN=cont))

library("class")
library("MASS")

```
